title: PM, DG ISI discuss national security matters
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 6 (APP):Director General Inter Services Intelligence (ISI) Lt. Gen. Faiz Hamid called on Prime Minister
Imran Khan here on Wednesday.
Matters pertaining to national security were discussed during the meeting, said a press statement
issued by the PM Media Office.
